title: Email Helper
hook: A browser extension for non-obtrusive customer service.

title: AR for Accessibility at Giant Eagle
roles: Product Designer (initially 1 of 5, later revised independently)
hook: Smoothing the in-store experience of ADHD shoppers.
description: An in-store AR experience for limiting visual stimuli & lessen the cognitive overload experienced by shoppers with Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorder (ADHD).
